8.27.17  1:16 pm   Do you prefer elevators or escalators?

     for what situation

8.27.17  1:12 pm   Hi Bill! So, I have to memorize this specific order of things for work. Not gonna get into the specifics of what it all means and why I have to memorize the list in this specific order.... but the sequence of words begin with the letters "P. P. C. D. M. B. A. B. P. P. C. L. C. D. M. B. A. B. D. M.".... I know it is kind of a long sequence, but can you help me turn this into an acronym for a phrase or sentence or something that will help me memorize the order? That would be SUPER helpful. I can't come up with anything that sticks in my head.

     peter piper caught doing meth behind a building. peter piper's copyright lawyer caught doing meth behind a building. doing meth

     it's not a question

8.27.17  11:50 am   to the people who dislike the position of the button on the randy page- you can just refresh the page if moving your mouse to the button is too stressful for you. ctrl+R / command+R on mac

     ah, nice

8.27.17  11:11 am   Whay aren't you posting 

     i am, but i respect your opinion

8.27.17  10:48 am   are you working on any big projects i love your history of videos but are you planning on doing stuff that's longer i love your content

     it's important to remember that history of japan took 3 months, and history of the entire world took 11 months. anything significantly longer could take years. in the future i would prefer to keep things between 30 seconds and 4 minutes

     no

     all ideas are dumb

     try to do something completely different, and you may be happy when you least expect

     scientists are still trying to figure that out

8.27.17  3:05 am   can i answer questions for u please

     sure

8.27.17  2:41 am   hi bill I asked the question about what should I do when I've read all the questions. I noticed that at first your answer was "there's no way you've read all the questions" but then you changed it to "maybe you could run this page for me". why the change?

     i mis-read the question. i first thought it said 'what should i do if i've read all the questions'

8.26.17  9:52 pm   How do you answer questions asking if something is "not" something? Like if it were sunny outside and I asked you, "is the sun not out today?" Would 'yes' or 'no' be the correct response? 

     your answer should include "it is." ... you may also include yes or no but that's less important

8.26.17  7:56 pm   If black holes exist in the universe, then why don't white holes exist?

     the same reason your question does not use every letter of the alphabet

8.26.17  7:50 pm   Can you tell me my horoscope for today (I'm a Sagittarius)??? 

     to do a horroscope you need birthdate with time and year. an entire month without even a year is not going to be specific enough to say anything constructive whatsoever. that's like saying 'what's in the news, in april' and not even saying what day, or year. although there is one piece of information which i can tell about you, which is that there was probably christmas music playing on the radio when you were born. this doesn't say anything about the present time. actually now that i think about it, there is something i can tell you about your immediate future, which is that it is not your birthday any time in the next few weeks. i hope that helps

     it doesn't seem necessary

8.26.17  6:01 pm   8.25.17  1:12 am

By 'someone better' do you mean someone in better health or, quite literally, a person who is better?

     i was asking what the other person meant

     If it's the latter, lots of very talented people have been mentally ill. It's not a disease solely for sub-par humans. If it's the former, sorry for thinking the worst of you.

8.26.17  1:29 pm   oh myyyyyyy goooooodness I. i think i understand ?? in the past i think I remember you answering someone's question of "do you believe in reincarnation" with something like "I believe in it more than most people who believe in it believe in it." and then I just saw the stuff in the link to that question about "what frangrance of shampoo would you be if you were shampoo" and all of the questions are like that and your answer was "i guess i will find out soon enough" and it's like. when you "die" all of your particles that make up You get recycled into a million other things, including new people and animals and shampoo, etc etc. in addition any offspring you have also contain some of your particles and you contain some of the particles of your ancestors and other people's ancestors and everything gets to be most everything else at some point. wowee. am i close?

     not really

     do i get a sticker??? 

     you can get a whole pack of stickers, at a pretty decent price these days

8.26.17  1:01 pm   whats your process of making melodies and motifs for your songs?

     i just try a bunch of stuff and if i hate it then maybe i can do better next time

      ive been trying to make an original song for myself but I'm not sure where to start. could you give some advice?

     i think you should just try a bunch of stuff and if you hate it then maybe you can do better next time

8.26.17  12:56 pm   are u an illuminati puppet?

     i am a puppeteer

8.26.17  12:09 pm   difference between Csus2 and C9 ?

     usually C9 is understood to mean "C7 with 9" which is understood to mean "C dominant 7, with 9", which means it includes notes E and Bb. Csus2 is usually understood to be only C, D, G

     it depends on the temperature
